rules.name: allChargedCreeperHeadsDrop
rules.description: All mobs killed by a charged creeper drop their head instead of only one

rules.name: commandSeed
rules.description: Permission level required to use /seed
extras: ops/2 for only ops, true/0 for anyone
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: deathItemsDespawnMinutes
rules.description: How many minutes it takes for a player's items to despawn after death
extras: -1 for infinte, 0 for instant despawn, max value 32

rules.name: disableBlazeFire
rules.description: Disables fire made from blaze fireballs

rules.name: disableGhastFire
rules.description: Disables fire made from ghast fireballs

rules.name: dispensersBucketMobs
rules.description: Dispensers can pick up bucketable mobs

rules.name: dispensersCureVillagers
rules.description: Dispensers feed golden apples to zombie villagers with weakness
extras: Note: dispensers curing a villager does not lower the villager's prices due to gossips being player-specific

rules.name: dispensersDuplicateAllays
rules.description: Dispensers duplicate dancing allays with amethyst shards

rules.name: dispensersDyeMobs
rules.description: Dispensers can dye sheep (and shulkers if dyeableShulkers is enabled)

rules.name: dispensersNameMobs
rules.description: Dispensers use name tags on mobs

rules.name: dispensersRepairGolems
rules.description: Dispensers can repair Iron Golems with iron ingots

rules.name: dragonBlockDamage
rules.description: Set dragon block damage breaking type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
extras: destroy: broken blocks are destroyed and not dropped

rules.name: dyeableShearedSheep
rules.description: Sheared sheep can be dyed

rules.name: dyeableShulkers
rules.description: Shulkers can be dyed
extras: Color can be reset to default using a water bottle

rules.name: echoShardsEnableShriekers
rules.description: Using an echo shard on a sculk shrieker allows it to summon wardens

rules.name: fasterOxidation
rules.description: Blocks oxidize much faster when touching water

rules.name: infinityMendingStacking
rules.description: Allows infinity and mending to stack on bows, like in 1.9 to 1.11

rules.name: lightningGlowifiesSquids
rules.description: Squids struck by lightning convert to glow squids

rules.name: maxPlayerXpDrop
rules.description: Maximum amount of xp players drop on death
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: mobItemPickup
rules.description: Overwrites random default pickup chance when mob spawns
extras: Only zombie and skeleton type mobs are affected
never: mobs don't pick up items

rules.name: mobsDropNametag
rules.description: Named mobs drop their name tag on death
extras: Note: mobs will drop a name tag even if they weren't named with one
This may also cause name tags to be able to be duped

rules.name: moveableWaterloggedBlocks
rules.description: Waterlogged blocks stay waterlogged when moved with a piston

rules.name: noCreeperBlockBreaking
rules.description: Disables creeper explosion block breaking

rules.name: noFeatherFallingTrample
rules.description: Prevents farmland from being trampled if you have feather falling

rules.name: noGhastBlockBreaking
rules.description: Disables ghast fireball explosion block breaking

rules.name: noRepairCost
rules.description: Removes additional cost for using an item in an anvil multiple times

rules.name: noSnowGolemMelting
rules.description: Prevents Snow Golems from melting in hot biomes

rules.name: noVillagerWitchConversion
rules.description: Villagers don't convert to witches when struck by lightning

rules.name: phantomSpawningTime
rules.description: Amount of ticks before Phantoms start having a chance to spawn
validators: Must be a positive number or 0

rules.name: protectionStacking
rules.description: Allows all the different protection types to stack on the same piece of armor, like in 1.14 to 1.14.2

rules.name: quickHarvesting
rules.description: Right click crops with a hoe to harvest and replant

rules.name: removableCurses
rules.description: Curses are also removed when using grindstones or repair crafting

rules.name: renewableDragonEgg
rules.description: Dragon eggs will always be placed on the portal after defeating the dragon

rules.name: renewableRawOres
rules.description: An anvil landing on Iron/Gold/Copper blocks turns them into the raw ore block version

rules.name: shaveSnowLayers
rules.description: Snow layers can be shaved, removing one layer, when right clicked with a shovel

rules.name: slimeLooting
rules.description: Bigger slimes spawn more smaller slimes when killed with looting
extras: Additional slimes can be up to as many levels of looting as you have (up to +3 with looting 3, etc)

rules.name: vexesNerf
rules.description: Vexes will start to die after the evoker that summoned them dies

rules.name: villagersAlwaysConvert
rules.description: Villagers will always convert to Zombie Villagers when killed by a zombie, even on easy and normal difficulty

rules.name: villagersExplodeBeds
rules.description: Villagers cause explosions when trying to use beds in the nether or end, like players
extras: "But why?" Idk, it's just a funny idea I had
